en-US.start.message: Hello there! Drop your media here to start conversion! (supports video, image and sticker conversions).
en-US.help.header: Here are the currently available conversion types:
en-US.help.footer: Drop a video, image or sticker to start your file conversion today! Have ideas and suggestions for this mini project? Head over to the Project Repository (https://github.com/tjtanjin/simple-media-converter)!
